pageContext.claim: “But two weeks ago, Sonny, they ordered the largest, China, the largest order of corn in the history of our country.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump routinely claims that China recently placed the largest order of corn in U.S. history. But that's wrong. The largest daly order of corn, by far, were placed by the Soviet Union in 1991 -- 3.7 million metric tons, according to the Department of Agriculture. China's order on July 30 ranks third.
